data.text: @AllanGi12263788 @VicGovDH That's fascinating. Why don't we just have never-ending lockdowns? Think of the lives it would save.

@Ambitious_frog @VicGovDH Yep - suicides dropped in Victoria during lockdowns - a combination of lack of opportunity and reduced interpersonal stress.
People abusing people are the leading cause of suicides.

@JohannaSzabo1 @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH @TGAgovau Ooo dear, you do know the liver is the only organ that can grow back right? Line-1 exists in all cells that divides. Anyway WoW 😂 stop this conversation you confused more people 😂

@PeepsMedia @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH @TGAgovau You've missed the point, it's not about the human liver or cancer, tumour cell lines are used simply because they continually divide instead of dying like a normal cell, thus becoming immortalised and useful in research.
Anyway, it's over and out for me.

@JohannaSzabo1 @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH @TGAgovau I don't mislead, i can't type the whole research here but it is confirmed, in the abstract section, last sentence!

Your interpretation of what i type is incorrect! I am not responsible for your reading skills 🤣
@N_J_Bennett @JohannaSzabo1 @VicGovDH @TGAgovau I got no idea what you talking about 😂

@JohannaSzabo1 @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH @TGAgovau Are you kidding me? How do you do this research in actual human? Cut them open, extract their liver sample and examine it? This research is not about causing cancer!

And yes should be paused until we know more, from the research there are too many unknowns for 94% adoption.
